briefdescription.para: Typedef to represent the Characteristic property of Model Number.
This module contains Ble Device Information Service Register API along with the Characteristics.

detaileddescription.para: Attribute handle for the Device Information service
Device Information Service UUID as per the BLE Specifications
Manufacturer String Characteristics as per the BLE Specifications
Model Number String Characteristics as per the BLE Specifications
SoftwareRevision String Characteristics as per the BLE Specifications

briefdescription.para: This is to configure the user characteristics value for the BLE standard Device Information Service .

detaileddescription.para: Prerequisite: Failing to call this API before BleDeviceInformationService_Register() would result in unknown characteristics value for Device Information Service

parameterdescription.para: structure to hold the characteristic value.
if success RETCODE_FAILURE for error case

briefdescription.para: This API registers the BLE standard Device Information Service & needs to be called in the BLE GAP event callback function registered using the BlePeripheral_Initialize() API for proper operation.

parameterdescription.para: if BLE Service Registered successfully RETCODE_FAILURE Failed to Register the Ble Device Info Service

briefdescription.para: This function handles the Device Information service events.

parameterdescription.para: serverCallbackParms Parameters holding service event status
